column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I don't know if it's for the fact that I've had tapas while in Sevilla
column3: or the food just simply isn't that good. But regardless
column4: the experience underwhelmed. The plates were tiny
column5: the prices for the actual dishes with subsistence were in the high range
column7: and the sangrias tasted like the boxed stuff from Target.
